text: (visvasavantayini! anubhavayata) obata valakvana lada dæya nam, (ibe) maranayata pat vu dæyada, leda, urange mas mamsada, (kurban karana vita) allah novana (venat) namayak kiyana lada dæyada vanneya. ebævin kavurun ho simava ikmava noyada, papayak kirime adahasak nomætivada sitiyadi, (meva anubhava kirimata) bala karanu læbuvahot (eya), ohu kerehi varadak næta. niyata vasayenma allah itamat ksama karanneku vasayenda, asimita dayabaravada sitinneya
